trans-unit.source: Represents the policy associated with a <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示与 <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> 相关联的策略。

trans-unit.source: A policy is a set of rules to be followed by a <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> instance and its clients.
trans-unit.target: 策略是一组规则，<xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> 实例及其客户端需要遵守这些规则。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> instance is used to examine and modify the policy associated with a specific <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> 实例用于检查和修改与特定 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> 相关联的策略。

trans-unit.source: A policy can describe the minimum and maximum allowable log sizes, or how the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> instance is allowed to grow.
trans-unit.target: 策略可描述允许的最小和最大日志大小，或者 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> 实例的允许增长方式。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can also control whether a <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> instance can be archived.
trans-unit.target: 此外，还可以控制是否能够存档 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> 实例。

trans-unit.source: After changing any of the properties, you should use the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy.Commit%2A> method to ensure that the changes are applied to the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>.
trans-unit.target: 更改任何属性之后，都应使用 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy.Commit%2A> 方法，以确保将更改应用于 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy.Refresh%2A> method to discard changes or to get the most current policy.
trans-unit.target: 调用 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy.Refresh%2A> 方法可以放弃更改，或获得最新策略。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> class to set policy for a log record sequence.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> 类来设置日志记录序列的策略。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> can grow automatically.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> 是否能够自动增长。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> can grow its size automatically; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> 能够自动增加其大小，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> class to set policy for a log record sequence.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> 类来设置日志记录序列的策略。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the percentage of free space the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> can shrink.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> 可收缩的可用空间百分比。

trans-unit.source: The percentage of free space the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> can shrink.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> 可收缩的可用空间百分比。

trans-unit.source: When the amount of free space in the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> is greater than the amount specified by this property, the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> automatically reduces its size until it reaches the size specified by the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy.MinimumExtentCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> 中的可用空间量大于此属性所指定的量时，<xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> 会自动减小其大小，直至达到 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy.MinimumExtentCount%2A> 属性所指定的大小为止。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> class to set policy for a log record sequence.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> 类来设置日志记录序列的策略。

trans-unit.source: Sets this policy as the current policy for the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" />.
trans-unit.target: 将此策略设置为 <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> 的当前策略。

trans-unit.source: You must call <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy.Commit%2A> after making any changes to ensure that the changes are recorded.
trans-unit.target: 进行任何更改之后，都必须调用 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy.Commit%2A>，以确保将这些更改记录下来。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> class to set policy for a log record sequence.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> 类来设置日志记录序列的策略。

trans-unit.source: The set of policies installed on the log is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 安装在日志上的策略集是无效的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A policy of the log prevented this operation from completing.
trans-unit.target: 日志的某个策略阻止完成此操作。

trans-unit.source: The request could not be performed because of an unexpected I/O exception.
trans-unit.target: 由于出现意外的 I/O 异常，因此无法执行该请求。

trans-unit.source: Setting this policy is not supported on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: 在当前平台上不支持设置此策略。

trans-unit.source: The method was called after the sequence has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 该方法是在序列已释放之后调用的。

trans-unit.source: There is not enough memory to continue the execution of the program.
trans-unit.target: 没有足够的内存来继续执行该程序。

trans-unit.source: The new extent prefix is invalid or too long.
trans-unit.target: 新范围前缀无效或太长。

trans-unit.source: A valid prefix must be provided.
trans-unit.target: 必须提供有效的前缀。

trans-unit.source: The record sequence is full.
trans-unit.target: 记录序列已满。

trans-unit.source: Access for the specified log store is denied by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统拒绝了对指定的日志存储区的访问。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rate of automatic growth of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> 的自动增长率。

trans-unit.source: The rate of automatic growth of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> 的自动增长率。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> becomes full, this policy value determines how much more space can be added.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> 满时，此策略值确定可添加的空间量。

trans-unit.source: Space will not be added if it causes the number of extents in the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> to exceed <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy.MaximumExtentCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值使 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> 中的范围数超过 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy.MaximumExtentCount%2A>，则不会添加空间。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> class to set policy for a log record sequence.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> 类来设置日志记录序列的策略。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogExtent" /> instances the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> can contain.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogExtent" /> 最多能够包含的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> 实例数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogExtent" /> instances the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> can contain.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogExtent" /> 最多能够包含的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> 实例数。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> class to set policy for a log record sequence.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> 类来设置日志记录序列的策略。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum number of <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogExtent" /> instances the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> can contain.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogExtent" /> 最少能够包含的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> 实例数。

trans-unit.source: An integer that specifies the minimum number of <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogExtent" /> instances the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> can contain.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，它指定 <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogExtent" /> 最少能够包含的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> 实例数。

trans-unit.source: Since the CLFS requires that the minimum extent count to be 2 extents, this value should be at least 2.
trans-unit.target: CLFS 要求最小范围数为 2 个范围，因此，此值最小应为 2。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> class to set policy for a log record sequence.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> 类来设置日志记录序列的策略。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the prefix string for automatically created extents.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于自动创建的范围的前缀字符串。

trans-unit.source: The prefix string for automatically created extents.
trans-unit.target: 用于自动创建的范围的前缀字符串。

trans-unit.source: This string can contain a full path to the directory where the new extent is created.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串可包含一个完整路径，指向创建新范围的目录。

trans-unit.source: The default path to the extent is the directory that contains the base <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> file.
trans-unit.target: 范围的默认路径是包含基 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> 文件的目录。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> class to set policy for a log record sequence.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> 类来设置日志记录序列的策略。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the suffix number for new extents.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置新范围的后缀数。

trans-unit.source: The suffix number for new extents.
trans-unit.target: 新范围的后缀数。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> class to set policy for a log record sequence.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> 类来设置日志记录序列的策略。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space that the <see cref="E:System.IO.Log.LogRecordSequence.TailPinned" /> event requires for advancing the base of the log.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="E:System.IO.Log.LogRecordSequence.TailPinned" /> 事件前调日志基数所要求的空间量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space that the <see cref="E:System.IO.Log.LogRecordSequence.TailPinned" /> event requires for advancing the base of the log.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="E:System.IO.Log.LogRecordSequence.TailPinned" /> 事件前调日志基数所要求的空间量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space can be expressed in percentage, or in bytes which is rounded off to the nearest containers in CLFS.
trans-unit.target: 空间量可表示为百分比，也可表示为字节数，在 CLFS 中，字节数舍入到最接近的容器。

trans-unit.source: The default is 35 percent.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 35%。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> class to set policy for a log record sequence.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> 类来设置日志记录序列的策略。

trans-unit.source: Reads the current policy for the <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" />, discarding any changes that may have been made.
trans-unit.target: 读取 <see cref="T:System.IO.Log.LogStore" /> 的当前策略，放弃已做的所有更改。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> class to set policy for a log record sequence.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.IO.Log.LogPolicy> 类来设置日志记录序列的策略。

trans-unit.source: The set of policies installed on the log is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 安装在日志上的策略集是无效的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A policy of the log prevented this operation from completing.
trans-unit.target: 日志的某个策略阻止完成此操作。

trans-unit.source: The request could not be performed because of an unexpected I/O exception.
trans-unit.target: 由于出现意外的 I/O 异常，因此无法执行该请求。

trans-unit.source: Setting this policy is not supported on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: 在当前平台上不支持设置此策略。

trans-unit.source: The method was called after the sequence has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 该方法是在序列已释放之后调用的。

trans-unit.source: There is not enough memory to continue the execution of the program.
trans-unit.target: 没有足够的内存来继续执行该程序。

trans-unit.source: The record sequence is full.
trans-unit.target: 记录序列已满。

trans-unit.source: Access for the specified log store is denied by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统拒绝了对指定的日志存储区的访问。
